elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "Unemployment".

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What has changed in the retail trade in recent years?
elements.correctAnswer: Greater competition, stores of international chains, online shopping, purchases abroad, jobs in the retail trade are being lost. New jobs in logistics, digital offerings.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are the causes of unemployment?
elements.correctAnswer: Structural change, e.g. in the retail trade; new technologies, IT, Internet

elements.name: panel2
elements.title: Answer the following questions about the factual text "Unemployment".

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Conduct a survey to investigate the shopping behavior of young people, families and older people: For example, shopping at international chains such as H&M, C&A, Aldi and others, shopping in nearby countries and online shopping. Present your results in a graph, for example. In addition, show what effects the change in the population's shopping behavior has on the job market and find out how retail specialists can train for these new tasks after their apprenticeship.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: In retail, the number of jobs on the store floor is decreasing and new jobs are being created in logistics and the development of digital products. Find out how you can train for these new roles after your apprenticeship.
